title: Body Glide For Her Anti Chafe Balm: anti chafing stick with added emollients. Prevent rubbing leading to chafing, raw skin, and irritation. Use for arm, chest, bra, butt, groin, and thigh chafing: 0.8oz
description: For Her is protective in spots where skin rubs together, like thighs, the underside of arms, on heels and toes. The balm creates an invisible barrier and guards against chapped and cracked skin. Great in dry or humid heat, or in the cold. Ideal every day for work, travel, fitness, and play.
